greeting.content: hi how i can hep you?

photo.content: Dear guest, the fast way to get close to the main attractions is by taking the tram,                if you dont want to walk From the Apartment take the (tram T2 directios Unita). The Tram stop near apartment is called: (Belfiore) In 3 stops takes you near Duomo and you have to stop at: (Unita) You can use the same tram (T2 direction Peretola) to get back to the apartment it takes only 5/8 min (type linefoto)

lugg.content: Dear guest, Storing your luggage on-sit after the check-out time, is challenging for us because we dont have a proper place were to store them, and we need to prepare rooms for upcoming guests.Fortunately, there is a convenient luggage storage facility at the nearby train station,where you can securely leave your belongings. The cost is 1 euro hour or 6 euros for the entire day. We appreciate your understanding and hope this alternative meets your needs. Check the link ->

content: Dear guest for the check-out you have just to leave the keys in the table inside the room, and make sure not to forget anything
turn of light an AC and close the doors.  We wish you a nice trip pon your next destination :)
Dear guest here are the numbers to book a taxi
